amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Administrative Review and Appeals by $2 million and to decrease funding for Salaries and Expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Administrative Review and Appeals by $2 million and to decrease funding for Salaries and Expenses of the Federal Prison System by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the First Cohen amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 282 (Roll no. 247).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the First Cohen amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 127 - 282 (Roll no. 247).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Cohen.
